name: DEVIL DUMPER DORIS
description:
The lord of a domain revives as a vampire in present day,
controlling an army of ghouls to recapture the lands that were once his.
Doris, a monster specialist has been hired to take out the trash by clearing out this castle of demons.
This is a stage clearing horizontal-scrolling action platforming game.
Defeat the demons by utilizing your whip action and sub weapon!


◆　Whip Control
You can swing the whip around with the attack button + shift key.
This allows you to protect yourself in a situation where you're surrounded by enemies.


◆Hook Action
Defeating weak enemies sends them to heaven as a hook.
Hitting the hook with your whip will rapidly pull you to the hook.
